actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that the requirements of section 315 of such Act relating to equal broadcasting opportunities for political candidates shall not apply to candidates for the offices of President and Vice President.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that the requirements of such Act relating to equal broadcasting opportunities for political candidates shall not apply to candidates for the offices of President and Vice President.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that the requirements of section 315 of such Act relating to equal broadcasting opportunities for political candidates shall not apply to candidates for the offices of President and Vice President.
